name: Very Valentino 24 Hour Long Wear Liquid Foundation
about: What it is:A semi-matte foundation that perfectly balances three foundation dreams: buildable coverage, breathable texture, and long-lasting wear for up to 24 hours..Coverage:Medium.Finish:Natural.Formulation:Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:- The Valentino Magic Floating Powder: Absorbs up to three times its own weight..What Else You Need to Know:This semi-matte foundation is formulated with exclusive Light-Lasting™ Technology, which delivers buildable, medium coverage that is hydrating and transfer resistant. It’s available in 40 inclusive shades that were tested on 5,000 women to ensure a perfect finish, from the lightest to deepest shades.
ingredients: -The Valentino Magic Floating Powder: Absorbs up to three times its own weight. .-Light-Wear Polymer: Helps lock the formula onto the skin. .-Glycerin: For a fresh and hydrated look that lasts all day...Aqua / Water / Eau, Dimethicone, Isododecane, Alcohol Denat., Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Butylene Glycol, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Phenyl Trimethicone, Titanium Dioxide, Glycerin, Perlite, Isopropyl Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Bis-Peg/Ppg-14/14 Dimethicone, Magnesium Sulfate, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Dipentaerythrityl Tetrahydroxystearate/Tetraisostearate, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Parfum / Fragrance, Silica Silylate, Magnesium Silicate, Silica, Linalool, Limonene, Bht, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia Fruit Oil / Bergamot Fruit Oil, Tin Oxide, Citronellol, Benzyl Alcohol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Start by applying Valentino’s V-Lighter Face Base (sold separately) with your fingertips in the places you want to both hydrate skin and provide high-level glow and freshness. .-Shake the Very Valentino 24 Hour Long Wear Liquid Foundation bottle before applying your liquid foundation..-To bring a fresh flush of color to your look, finish your complexion ritual using Valentino’s Eye2cheek (sold separately) on the cheeks...Very Valentino Three Application Techniques:..For a natural, semi-matte finish:.-Apply Very Valentino foundation to the center of the face..-Blend out and down in a buffing motion...For a natural, radiant, semi-matte finish:.-Start by applying V-Lighter face base with your fingertips in the places you want to both hydrate and provide high-level glow and freshness. .-Apply Very Valentino foundation to the center of the face..-Blend out and down in a buffing motion. .-Amplify your glow by layering V-Lighter face base on the high planes of the face to emphasize your features...For a sophisticated, semi-matte finish:.-Apply Very Valentino foundation to the center of the face..-Blend out and down in a buffing motion. .-To amplify both coverage and sophistication, apply your corresponding Valentino Go-Clutch powder (sold separately) all over the face in a soft, sweeping motion...How to find your shade:.-With a color spectrum of 40 shades to fit every skin color, skin tone, and undertone, Very Valentino foundation aims to offer flawless-looking radiance for everyone. .-Decode the digits to find your skin color, tone, and undertone. ..The first letter is for your skin tone:.-L or LIG for light..-M for medium..-D for deep. ..The second letter designates your undertone: .-R for Rosa, standing for cool pink or red undertones. For skin that tends to burn in the sun and looks best in silver. .-N for Neutra, for neutral, balanced, undertones. For skin that tends to burn and tan in the sun and equally suits golden and silver jewelry. .-A for Ambra, for warm golden or yellow undertones. For skin that tends to tan in the sun and looks best in gold jewelry. ..The last number is your skin color intensity:.-From 1, the lighter intensity, to 5, the darker intensity...Light skin tone:.-L-Rosa (LIGR): for light skin tones with cool undertones..-L-Neutra (LN): for light skin tones with neutral undertones..-L-Ambra (LA): for light skin tones with warm undertones...Medium skin tone:.-M-Rosa (MR): for medium skin tones with cool undertones..-M-Neutra (MN): for medium skin tones with neutral undertones..-M-Ambra (MA): for medium skin tones with warm undertones...Dark skin tone:.-D-Rosa (DA): for deep skin tones with cool undertones..-D-Neutra (DN): for deep skin tones with neutral undertones..-D-Ambra (DA): for deep skin tones with warm undertones.

reviews.review_title: Must have for really pale skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing foundation for light skin. Not yellowish. Not a lot of products available for really pale skin. This is must try. I usually wear EL double wear in porcelain and was looking for lighter coverage option. And this is amazing. Easy to apply

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this foundation, my skin looks very glow and a natural , highly recommended this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I mis it with LN4 and it just looks perfect. Your skin if well prepared looks luxurious with this foundation ❤️ definitely in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve had this foundation a month and have tried to make it work every way I know how because I like the color so much. Sadly this foundation is really not suitable for dry skin. Sits in fine lines and clings to dry spots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m starting to get the impression that all the best products are the ones NOT heavily talked about cause this foundation is amazing! Initially I wasn’t interested in yet another designer makeup brand but I became just okay with the Gucci foundation & began to start looking  to see if there was something better. Which lead me to Valentino & Prada and Valentino was visibly more superior for “me” Shade match with Valentino is spot on, like I literally can’t even see it it’s just that good & better than any shade I’ve had thus far. Texture is the perfect satin/matte & def full coverage without looking like a mask but still blends beautifully & becomes 1 with your skin. I tested with & without primer and both were good but since I have some texture, the Gucci primer def elevated the finish to perfection. I’m so happy I decided to try this foundation & not just rely on being comfortable with Gucci cause I certainly would have been missing out on finally having a HG foundation that is literally perfect straight out the bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a lot of foundations, like a lot. This is my absolute favourite, it looks so beautiful on my skin. For reference I am over 40 with dry skin. It does run light, I got MN1 and I usually wear light-medium neutral undertones in other foundations. undertones I will say that

reviews.review_title: Love it!  Will be repurchasing it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite foundation!  Perfect color match.  I am pretty tanned/caramel complexion so it's harder to find the right undertone for certain brands.  I love that it has a soft matte finish.   Bit of reflective highlight shimmer in the foundation to give you the perfect finish.   I have dry skin type and found it quite smooth for texture.   It is scented yes, but nothing unbearable as i am sensitive to floral fragrances due to my sinuses.  Will be repurchased again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had to return this after only wearing once due to the very strong scent. It’s like you’ve sprayed your entire face with perfume. The scent didn’t dissipate and continued to linger after 7hrs of wear.

The colour match on this was perfect for me, and it went on beautifully.  It did break up as the day wore on, and would have needed touching up if I intended to go out later on. Unfortunately, the perfume is so strong that it made me sneeze, and the scent lasted for several hours.  People around me noticed it.  That amount of perfume is unacceptable. It suggests that there is a ton of alcohol in the product, which is very drying. Valentino should reformulate this without the perfume.  As it is, I cannot wear this foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pricey. I was on the fence between this and the lancome with the white lid, so I bought both. This one is a bit more dry, so I need to mix 1 for 1 with a beauty oil. Nice color match (Mac NC 20 for reference) I like to mix the lancome and this together for the perfect finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation looks so good on. If you look at the bottle closely you will see pearlescent particles in it, which doesn’t look glittery on face but in fact lends a nice subtle glow. My only gripe is that I bought this directly from Valentino and the store had warm lighting so I chose a shade that was darker than my usual skin tone. And then with time the foundation turns orange too. I wish it didn’t oxidize so much on me. I really like the formula though. I’d probably pick 2 shades lighter next time.

First impressions, the glass bottle looks and feels very luxe. The foundation is a medium coverage with a nice semi-matte finish that looked natural. Unfortunately it didn't work out for me because the medium neutral (MN3) shade was too yellow, and my combination skin got oily in a few hours even with primer and setting spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I have oily dehydrated skin and this just sits so beautifully. It’s not heavy but it provides me with great coverage. It just sits on the skin so naturally and have great staying power. Must have for oilier skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation so much. Color perfectly match my skin tone and the texture is easy to apply. Lasting long too.
